Sentencas: New materials belonging to the La2Srn-2TinO3n+1 system have been targeted as having the potential to provide suitable materials for high performance anode applications in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Characterisation of oxide anodes for fuel cells

Sentencas: These compounds can be regarded as an intergrowth of two different structures, viz. distorted pyrochlore (La2Ti2O7) and perovskite (SrTiO3).
Titulo: Characterisation of oxide anodes for fuel cells

Sentencas: By synthesising intergrown structures between the above two end members, it is possible to follow the evolution of the system from monoclinic through to cubic phases.
Titulo: Characterisation of oxide anodes for fuel cells
